Events that occurred on 9 April.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1802 - Philologist Elias Lönnrot, who compiled the Kalevala, is born.
1902 - Inkling Lord David Cecil is born.
1949 - Voice actor Sorcha Cusack is born.
1957 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Mr Hayward.
1973 – W.H. Lewis, Inkling and brother of C.S. Lewis, dies.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 2510:
Eorl the Young and the Éothéod travel towards the Field of Celebrant.
